ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ressmpl.s | |- S = ( I mPoly R ) |
| 2 |  | ressmpl.h | |- H = ( R |`s T ) |
| 3 |  | ressmpl.u | |- U = ( I mPoly H ) |
| 4 |  | ressmpl.b | |- B = ( Base ` U ) |
| 5 |  | ressmpl.1 | |- ( ph -> I e. V ) |
| 6 |  | ressmpl.2 | |- ( ph -> T e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) |
| 7 |  | ressmpl.p | |- P = ( S |`s B ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( I mPwSer H ) = ( I mPwSer H ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( I mPwSer H ) ) = ( Base ` ( I mPwSer H ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` S ) = ( Base ` S ) |
| 11 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 | #P_ressmplbas2 | |- ( ph -> B = ( ( Base ` ( I mPwSer H ) ) i^i ( Base ` S ) ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_inss2 | |- ( ( Base ` ( I mPwSer H ) ) i^i ( Base ` S ) ) C_ ( Base ` S ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_syl6eqss | |- ( ph -> B C_ ( Base ` S ) ) |
| 14 | 7, 10 | #P_ressbas2 | |- ( B C_ ( Base ` S ) -> B = ( Base ` P ) ) |
| 15 | 13, 14 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` P ) ) |
